A B C D E F G I L M N O P R S T U V W 
All Classes|All Packages

P

playBonusAudio() - Static method in class controller.AudioController
This audio is played every time the frog gains an insect bonus
playEndAudio() - Static method in class controller.AudioController
This audio is played every time the frog reaches an end
playGameOverAudio() - Static method in class controller.AudioController
This audio is played when the player loses the game
playHopAudio() - Static method in class controller.AudioController
This audio is played for each movement of the frog In order to play it for each W,A,S,D key press, we have to rewind it every time before playing We do so using seek(Duration.ZERO)
playMenuAudio() - Static method in class controller.AudioController
Allows us to play the menu audio continuously by using setCycleCount and setting it to indefinite
playStreetDeathAudio() - Static method in class controller.AudioController
This audio should be played every time the frog dies when hit by a vehicle
playWaterDeathAudio() - Static method in class controller.AudioController
This audio should be played every time the frog dies when sunk We rewind it before playing so that it can be played every time the frog sinks
playWinAudio() - Static method in class controller.AudioController
This audio is played when the player completes all the levels and wins the game
